Careers

SSCRI QP Facilitator_Case Manager SSCRI DWI ADETS Instructor Job Description SSCRI Associate and Fully Licensed Clinicians Job Description   Confidential/Privacy Policy:Information obtained through the internet is kept strictly confidential. We make it our priority to protect your privacy and confidentiality.

We are always looking for talented individuals who specialize in Substance Abuse, Behavioral/Mental Health and DWI Services Counseling/Treatment. Please see job descriptions for the specific talent we are looking for. If you would like to apply for any of these jobs please fill out our form and send your resume to Anissa Howard at ahoward@steppingstonescri.net
